about_the_game:
Dive into the adrenaline-pumping action of Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz, where the fate of the city rests in your hands! This action-packed shooter throws you into a city overrun by the undead, transforming every corner into a battle for survival.

Key Features:



Intense Action Shooter: Experience heart-racing combat against relentless waves of zombies. Precision and quick reflexes are your best allies as you fight to reclaim the city streets.
Realistic Physics: Enjoy realistic physics with ragdoll mechanics, making every kill satisfying and unique as enemies react dynamically to your attacks.
Urban Battle Arenas: Each level is a dynamic fighting arena set in various city environments, from deserted downtown districts to eerie alleyways. Adapt your strategy to the unique challenges of each location.
Diverse Arsenal: Arm yourself with an array of powerful weapons. From shotguns and assault rifles to explosive devices, customize your loadout to obliterate the zombie hordes.
Gripping Campaign: Embark on a thrilling campaign that unfolds through multiple levels, each more challenging than the last. Face off against different types of zombies, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.

Prepare yourself for non-stop action and a fight for survival in Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz. The city needs a hero—will you answer the call?

Join the fight now on Steam!

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes scenes of violence against fantastic creatures, mild amount of blood
